Greek President Wishes Korean People Peaceful Life
articles.content:
Greek President Wishes Korean People Peaceful Life 
    Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- Greek President Constantinos Stepanopolos, when receiving credentials from the DPRK ambassador on July 14, hoped that all the questions including the nuclear issue would be peacefully settled through dialogue at an early date, and the situation of the Korean peninsula be stabilized so that all the Korean people could live in peace.
 The Greek government expresses understanding and sympathy for the sufferings of the Korean people from the division of the country, the president stated, and added he was glad that the inter-Korean relations were developing favorably and this signified a positive contribution to world peace and security.

Group for Study of Songun Idea of Juche Formed in Chile
articles.content:
Group for Study of Songun Idea of Juche Formed in Chile 
    Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- The Chilean Group for the Study of the Songun Idea of Juche was inaugurated with due ceremony in Quilpue City on July 2.
 The chairman of the group elected at the ceremony said it was of really great significance that the group for the study of the Songun idea of Juche has been inaugurated in Chile for the first time. The Juche idea has been further developed and enriched thanks to the Songun politics pursued by leader Kim Jong Il, he added.    
 Noting that the Songun idea indicates the way of defending and developing genuine socialism at a time when reactionary forces have become most furious in history, he declared: We will study and disseminate the Songun idea of Juche and steadily expand the group.

Thai Party Delegation Arrives
articles.content:
Thai Party Delegation Arrives
    Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Thai Rak Thai Party led by Dr. Kantathi Suphamongkhon, a special envoy of party leader and Prime Minister Thaksin Shinawatra and a special party delegate, arrived here Tuesday.
 The delegation was greeted at the airport by Pak Kyong Son, vice-director of a department of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, and officials concerned.
